name: SHRI - Singapore Human Resources Institute
description: The SHRI group - comprising SHRI Academy, SHRI Corporate Learning & Consultancy Hub and The Singapore Professionals’ & Executives’ Co-operative (SPEC) - offers a wide range of services to promote continuous learning, skills-upgrading and professional development. Committed to developing appropriate standards of HR, SHRI is a pioneer of Singapore’s HR Accreditation Framework, The Singapore HR Awards, The National Workplace Happiness Survey, The Singapore HR Congress & Business-Connect Exposition and the Singapore HR Challenge for post-secondary and tertiary institutions. SHRI also works closely with national HR associations worldwide, such as the World Federation of People Management Associations (WFPMA), the Asia Pacific Federation of Human Resource Management (APFHRM) and the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM), to bring global and regional best HR practices and insights to people managers in Singapore.

Headline: Powering Human Capital
ShortDescription: Singapore Human Resources Institute (SHRI) is a leading, not-for-profit, professional HR body, which represents a strong network of members, comprising individuals and organisations across diverse industries.

Highlights.name: Courses and Programs
Highlights.description: SHRI offers a wide range of courses and programs on topics such as HR leadership, talent management, performance management, compensation and benefits, and industrial relations.

Highlights.name: Consultancy Services
Highlights.description: SHRI also provides consultancy services to businesses to help them improve their HR practices. SHRI's consultants can help businesses with a variety of HR issues, such as developing HR strategies, designing and implementing HR programs, and managing HR operations.

Highlights.name: Leading provider of HR training and consultancy
Highlights.description: SHRI is a leading provider of HR training and consultancy services in Singapore. They offer a wide range of courses and programs to help HR professionals develop their skills and knowledge in all aspects of HR management.

enhanced_description: SHRI - Singapore Human Resources Institute is a pioneering, not-for-profit professional HR body established in 1965, dedicated to advancing human capital and HR excellence in Singapore. Through its components like SHRI Academy and SHRI Corporate Learning & Consultancy Hub, it delivers a comprehensive suite of services including continuous learning, skills-upgrading, and professional development programs. SHRI is instrumental in setting HR standards, evidenced by its role in the Singapore HR Accreditation Framework, The Singapore HR Awards, and The National Workplace Happiness Survey. It also fosters a vibrant HR community by organizing events such as The Singapore HR Congress & Business-Connect Exposition and facilitating global best practices through partnerships with international associations like WFPMA, APFHRM, and SHRM. SHRI offers a wide range of courses covering HR leadership, talent management, performance management, compensation and benefits, industrial relations, and provides expert consultancy services to businesses of all sizes for improving their HR practices and operations.
